You can use the online contact form below, where your message will be dealt with as appropriate, or alternatively contact us on the telephone numbers below. Honorary Secretary , Peter Mahoney: Tel: 01702 526 911 You may complete this form to send an email directly to Belfairs Golf Club. Alternatively, you can send an email to the following email address: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk . Verification We do not support SPAM and we would never sell your information to anyone. Any correspondence is strictly confidential. We will only use the above information to contact you about your query. IMG Academy Golf Club | Bradenton Venue | PartySlate Skip to content Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Venues Planners Vendors Ideas IMG Academy Golf Club Find Venues / Florida / Bradenton / IMG Academy Golf Club IMG Academy Golf Club 4350 El Conquistador Pkwy, Bradenton, FL 34210, USA Max Seated 350 Max Standing 350 Request info Favorite Overview Gallery 0 About IMG Academy Golf Club Nestled next to Sarasota Bay’s showcase of natural wonders, IMG Academy Golf Club is a place of inspiration. With a pristine golf course and clubhouse boasting unmatched views, IMG Academy Golf Club is perhaps the best-kept secret in Southwest Florida for daily golfers and members alike. Located in Southwest Bradenton, IMG Academy Golf Club is only minutes from Sarasota Bradenton International Airport, white sand beaches and a host of nearby activities for all ages and interests. In addition to the course and housing, members and guests can utilize meeting rooms, fitness center, spa, and private dining rooms with panoramic views of beautiful Sarasota Bay. IMG Academy Golf Club truly provides everything you want in a golf/country club setting, from unspoiled views on an immaculate golf course to dining and event areas.

Our spectacular clubhouse with stunning, wide open views of Sarasota Bay, includes the Riviera Room, Coronado Room and Grille Room for special events up to 350 guests. Whether you decide on an elaborate dinner, business lunch or a simple brunch, we will be there to make your event successful. Event Spaces 1 350 max seated • 350 max standing 1 Outdoor Ceremony Site 350 Seated 350 Standing Outdoor Pricing Packages IMG Academy Golf Club hasn't listed their pricing yet. Connect with them directly to get a customized pricing proposal for your event. Request a Quote Amenities A/V Equipment Coat Check Handicap Accessible Kosher Kitchen Media Room Pet Friendly Pool Street Parking Valet Parking WiFi Windows Dance Floor Breakout Rooms In-house caterer only In-house suppliers only FAQs 6 What is included in the room rental fees? IMG Academy Golf Club provides complimentary use of round tables of 8 and 10 guests each, glassware, china, cutlery, gift table, cake table, head table, registry table, DJ table, standard linen, and 300 white wedding chairs. Are there additional charges on top of the food and room rental fee? We offer rental services for items such as a dance floor, stage, projector, piano, microphone, etc. for additional fees. Do you offer both an outdoor and indoor ceremony site? We do have both! If you wish to have your ceremony outside, we have a beautiful ageless oak tree right off the golf course that you can get married at or you can have the ceremony inside with panoramic views of
Sarasota Bay. Can we tour the venue? Of course! Please email our Banquet Manager, Jenna Trocchia, at jenna.trocchia@img.com or call (941) 739-7414 to set up a time to view our venue and get all the information you need prior to signing any contract, free of charge. For weddings, do you have a place for the bride and groom to get ready? Yes. We allow our brides to use the board room all day to prepare with your bridal party as well as a locker-room for the groom and groomsmen to get ready.
